description: Fayyinni Karoora Waaqayyoo baroota keessatti ture,dhala namaa biyya lafaa fi cubbuu jalaa Karaa ilmaa isaa Yesuus Kiristoosiin Waamicha guddaa dhala namaaf godhee,dhukkuba cubbuutti ilmaan namootaa hiikee,Ayyaanan karaa amantii dhala namaaf kennedha..
Fayyinni jaalala Waaqayyoo biyya lafaatti mul'atedha.
Fayyina kana keessatti Warri maqaa Yesuusitti amanan hunduu jireenya barabaraa qabu.
verses: Yoh 3:16:Waaqayyo, akkasitti tokkicha ilma isaa hamma kennuufitti biyya lafaa jaallate; kun immoo isatti kan amanu hundinuu jireenya bara baraa haa qabaatuuf malee, haa baduuf miti!

grace.description: Ayyaanni, wanta dhala namaaf hin mallee,Waaqayyo kennaa godhee ilmaan namaaf kennedha.

faith.description: Amantii waan ijaan hin argamne,Harkaan hin qabatamne,ni taha jedhanii guutummaatti abdatanii irratti of gadi dhiisuu

hope.description: Amantiidhaan fi ija jabummaan Waadaa Waaqayyoo Eeguu.

mercy.description: Arraarri,adabbii namaaf malu jalaa faara tolaadhaan ilaalamuu jechuudha,kana jechuun Gatii cubbuu,namaaf male jalaa Karaa Kiristoosiin ,ho'a fi jaalala Waaqayyoo Abbaa argachuuu.

forgiveness.description: Through Christ, God forgives and cleanses us.

prayer.description: Prayer is speaking and listening to God.

righteousness.description: Righteousness is right standing with God.

holiness.description: God calls His people to be holy.

obedience.description: Obedience shows our love for God.

glory.definition: Honor and praise given to God

sanctification.description: Sanctification is the ongoing work of the Holy Spirit.
